items.title: Independence Day
items.summary: Warm greetings to all the Maharashtrians. In the following years, may this…
items.content_html:
Warm greetings to all the Maharashtrians. In the following years, may this state progress with new advancements.
Maharashtra Divas is observed on May 1 by Maharashtra residents. This day marks the 62nd anniversary of the Bombay Reorganization Act, which established the state in 1960. Maharashtra Divas was commemorated at SGGSIE&T as every year, beginning with our director, Dr. Y. V. Joshi, hoisting the flag.
The event was attended by all of the institute's faculty members, as well as students and security officers.
The Constitution provided us with faith, liberty, and peace. So, let us take delight in this day.
“आम्हाला अभिमान आहे, महाराष्ट्रीय असल्याचा, आम्हाला गर्व आहे मराठी भाषेचा, आम्ही जपतो आमची संस्कृती, आमची निष्ठा, महाराष्ट्र दिनाच्या मनापासून शुभेच्छा… जय महाराष्ट्र”

items.title: Road Safety Workshop
items.summary: A workshop for headmasters and sports teachers was organised on October 12…
items.content_html: A workshop for headmasters and sports teachers was organised on October 12 at Shri Guru Gobind Singhji Institute of Engineering and Technology on behalf of the Regional Transport Office and District School Bus Safety Committee. At this event, a street drama on driving safely was performed. A little over 300 instructors attended this programme.The street play featured students from Gnanmata English School and Nagarjuna Public School. Kumari Kstakshi Mahesh Chakrawar gave a speech regarding road safety.Dr Sunil Kulkarni gave a demonstration on First Life System (CPR). How to give life support to a person in case of unconsciousness or other causes of unconsciousness in an accident. To promote road safety, everyone in attendance took an oath. Deputy Regional Transport Officer Avinash Raut and Assistant Regional Transport Officer Sandeep Nimse gave guidance on road safety. Assistant Motor Vehicle inspector Vaibhav Dubbewar likewise planned the program and guided everyone regarding road safety.Rules 2011 guided the Principal.There is a District School Bus Committee at the district level for the safe transportation of students in the district. At the school level, there is a school transport committee. It was suggested that a school transport committee should be formed in all the schools and seating arrangements should be arranged as per the rules.The chief guest of the program was College Director Dr.Yashwant Joshi, Dr.Arun Kumar Patil, Rohit Das Basvate, Retired Principal Ashok Kamtane,Deputy Regional Transport Officer Avinash Raut, Assistant Regional Transport Officer Sandeep Nimse, Assistant Motor Vehicle inspector Vaibhav Dubbewar.

items.title: Video for National Board of Accreditation
items.summary: Hello LinkedIn Fam! We Team Chitraksha as always have been working on…
items.content_html: Hello LinkedIn Fam! We Team Chitraksha as always have been working on bringing new and innovative concepts and presenting them. This time we have brought you the Video made for the survey of National Board of Accreditation (NBA), in which we have almost covered all the spectacular views of our Institute. Video Link: https://lnkd.in/dCXPEkus We also would like to Congratulate all of the Institute belongings for our great success as NBA has accredited special grades to Department of Electronics and Telecommunication, Instrumentation Engineering and Production Engineering. Video was shoot and edited in November by Team Chitraksha.

items.title: About Team Chitraksha
items.summary: TEAM CHITRAKSHA is The Official Media Club of Shri Guru Gobind Singhji…
items.content_html:
TEAM CHITRAKSHA is The Official Media Club of Shri Guru Gobind Singhji Institute of Engineering and Technology, Nanded

This club mainly provides a platform for students who wants to develop new skills and also want to upgrade themselves in photography and videography section.

Also, Chitraksha plays an integral role in all media-related activities.

We also give opportunities to students to come in the contact or handle the highly equipped devices such as professional DSLR’s and powerful iMac operating systems to assist in club activities. Moreover, students can gain a valuable experience and also develop many skills such as creative thinking, collaborating and also get leadership qualities in them which will help them in their future. They also get responsible by volunteering for the duties assigned to them during college events.

We hope that students gain a good experience, as well as support their dreams their passion for different areas of media. We also hope that we can influence people around us to appreciate the media in a better way, and also encourage them to take part in these activities as well.

Chitraksha is all about engaging people in one bond through its boundless love.
